rows.label: qst700101_msg0002
rows.name:
Ah! Sorry, I didn't mean to mumble
in front of customers! I was miles away.

rows.label: qst700101_msg0003
rows.name:
I've got this friend, you see, and lately
he's been, I dunno, distant? Absent-
minded? Just a bit weird I guess.

rows.label: qst700101_msg0004
rows.name:
He's stopped eating his favorite fish
dishes, so I know something's up...
But he won't talk to me about it.

rows.label: qst700101_msg0005
rows.name:
But maybe... Maybe you could get
through to him? Would you do that
for me?

rows.label: qst700101_msg0006
rows.name:
His name is Joey, and you can find him
tending to the Armu.

rows.label: qst700101_msg0007
rows.name:
Sorry to bother you with a little thing
like that. Hopefully, it's nothing at all.

rows.label: qst700101_msg0101
rows.name:
I thought you might talk to my friend
Joey for me - he tends to the Armus.
I hope you won't mind too much?

rows.label: qst700101_msg0102
rows.name:
Oh, and if he's got something troubling
him, I hope you'll lend him a hand!
'Cos he just won't talk to me at all...
